author: Joseph Young
title: U.S. Stocks Revival Fakes Out with 1929-Esque Bull Trap Warning
description: The U.S. stock market is set to open with a 2% drop. Analysts are unconvinced of the recovery, pointing toward the massive bull trap in 1929. The post U.S. Stocks Revival Fakes Out with 1929-Esque Bull Trap Warning appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The U.S. stock market is set to open with a 2% drop after a strong day of recovery on Thursday.
  • Analysts believe the recent upsurge resembles the 1929 Great Depression bull trap.
